Enjoy your movie night!

It's an action-packed adventure where a young woman discovers she descends from a line of warriors protecting our world from demons. Aidan Turner and Kevin Zegers star in this captivating film.

Another movie that might appeal to you is "District 9". This thought-provoking sci-fi film explores themes of ethics, as an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology. Sharlto Copley delivers an outstanding performance in this movie. Enjoy the watch!
